1.title: No Typical Day

episode of.title: Emergency Room: Life + Death at VGH (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: A climbing accident and a rare condition bring two young couples into the ER on Valentine's Day. Dr. Campbell must deal with a 10-inch blade sticking out of a patient's chest, while Dr. Theoret is faced with a heartbreaking case.

2.title: Talk to Me

episode of.title: Emergency Room: Life + Death at VGH (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Dr. McKnight tries his best to diagnose a patient who is deaf and blind. Deb, the ER's social worker, plays detective to track down the identity of a "John Doe".

3.title: Full Moon

episode of.title: Emergency Room: Life + Death at VGH (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: The full moon takes its toll on the ER as it is threatened to be overwhelmed by traumas. Dr. Shirzad treats a young nurse who collapses on duty and Dr. Campbell is faced with a doctor's most difficult decision.

4.title: Downtown

episode of.title: Emergency Room: Life + Death at VGH (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Paramedics Rick and Kelly hit the streets of Vancouver. Staff must deal with violence and drug abuse in the ER, while Dr. Rose confronts the horror of a multi-vehicle accident.

5.title: The Donor

episode of.title: Emergency Room: Life + Death at VGH (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: It's a shift of give and take as Dr. Campbell receives a patient with severe head injuries from the Air Ambulance. An ER nurse is given a medal for her military service, and the family of a deceased patient provides a stranger with a precious gift.

6.title: Watch Me

episode of.title: Emergency Room: Life + Death at VGH (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Yasmin takes a Unit Coordinator-in-training under her wing as the ER's veteran social worker begins her last shift. Doctors Campbell, Shirzad and Lee mentor the next generation of ER physicians.

1.title: We Turn No One Away

episode of.title: Emergency Room: Life + Death at VGH (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Triage sorts through bike accidents, severed fingers, a patient who has fallen off a mountain and one who barely needs a bandage. No case, large or small, is turned away by the emergency department of Vancouver General Hospital... and it's taking its toll.

2.title: Mondays

episode of.title: Emergency Room: Life + Death at VGH (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Mondays are the worst in the emergency department, with staff tackling a wide range of medical emergencies. Meanwhile, patients from the overflowing psychiatric assessment unit have filled up the beds and some are literally fighting to get out.

3.title: Full Code

episode of.title: Emergency Room: Life + Death at VGH (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: The staff faces overwhelming traffic from elderly patients suffering a range of medical issues. Doctors and nurses struggle with the conflicting issues of "living long" versus "living well."

4.title: Summer

episode of.title: Emergency Room: Life + Death at VGH (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Summer hits the ER and the air conditioning is down. From a nail in a boot, to an agonizing escharotomy following a severe burn, everybody is feeling the heat. An ER resident winds up in treatment after a head - injury on the water.

5.title: Nurses

episode of.title: Emergency Room: Life + Death at VGH (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: It's last days at VGH for Jo-Anne, the matriarch/charge nurse of the ER. Despite being surrounded by pain and suffering on a daily basis, most nurses love the challenge and share their secrets to surviving in "Emerg".

6.title: Going Home

episode of.title: Emergency Room: Life + Death at VGH (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Triage sorts through bike accidents, severed fingers, a patient who has fallen off a mountain and one who barely needs a bandage. No case, large or small, is turned away by the emergency department of Vancouver General Hospital... and it's taking its toll.
